languages.text: {n}Пробуждение от медитации встречает вас бодростью и непривычным спокойствием духа. Словно вы только что нагишом искупались под ледяным водопадом. Или произнесли вдохновенную речь перед тысячами подданных, и ликование толпы заполнило ваше сердце.{/n}

{n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пробуждение от медитации встречает вас бодростью и непривычным спокойствием духа. Словно вы только что нагишом искупались под ледяным водопадом. Или произнесли вдохновенную речь перед тысячами подданных, и ликование толпы заполнило ваше сердце.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The awakening after the meditation greets you with vigour and an unusual calmness. Like you have just taken a shower under the freezing waters of a waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and the crowd cheers have filled your heart.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The awakening after the meditation greets you with vigour and an unusual calmness. Like you have just taken a shower under the freezing waters of a waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and the crowd cheers have filled your heart.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你从冥想中醒来，全身精力充沛，心情异乎寻常地平静，仿佛刚刚在瀑布下冲了一个凉爽的冷水澡，又仿佛在万众瞩目下发表了一场酣畅淋漓的演说，臣民的倾慕令你心潮澎湃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从冥想中醒来，全身精力充沛，心情异乎寻常地平静，仿佛刚刚在瀑布下冲了一个凉爽的冷水澡，又仿佛在万众瞩目下发表了一场酣畅淋漓的演说，臣民的倾慕令你心潮澎湃。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Despiertas del trance con una sensación de vigor y serenidad, como si te acabaras de dar una ducha bajo una catarata de aguas gélidas, o hubieras pronunciado un discurso frente a miles de súbditos y tu corazón estuviese henchido por los vítores de la multitud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despiertas del trance con una sensación de vigor y serenidad, como si te acabaras de dar una ducha bajo una catarata de aguas gélidas, o hubieras pronunciado un discurso frente a miles de súbditos y tu corazón estuviese henchido por los vítores de la multitud.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous vous éveillez de votre méditation, calme et {mf|plein|pleine} de vigueur. Vous avez l'impression de vous être {mf|baigné|baignée} dans une chute d'eau glacée ou d'avoir déclamé un discours sous les vivats de milliers de sujets, le cœur à présent rempli de l'amour débordant de la foule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous éveillez de votre méditation, calme et {mf|plein|pleine} de vigueur. Vous avez l'impression de vous être {mf|baigné|baignée} dans une chute d'eau glacée ou d'avoir déclamé un discours sous les vivats de milliers de sujets, le cœur à présent rempli de l'amour débordant de la foule.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du erwachst aus deiner Meditation mit einem Gefühl der Stärke und ungewöhnlichen Ruhe. Als hättest du gerade unter einem eiskalten Wasserfall geduscht. Oder vor Tausenden Untertanen eine Rede gehalten, und die Begeisterung der Menge lässt dein Herz anschwellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erwachst aus deiner Meditation mit einem Gefühl der Stärke und ungewöhnlichen Ruhe. Als hättest du gerade unter einem eiskalten Wasserfall geduscht. Oder vor Tausenden Untertanen eine Rede gehalten, und die Begeisterung der Menge lässt dein Herz anschwellen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}瞑想から目覚めると、活力がみなぎり、いつもとは違う平静さを感じる。まるで凍てつく滝に打たれたかのように。あるいは、何千人もの聴衆の前で演説をし、その喝采に胸が高鳴るように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}瞑想から目覚めると、活力がみなぎり、いつもとは違う平静さを感じる。まるで凍てつく滝に打たれたかのように。あるいは、何千人もの聴衆の前で演説をし、その喝采に胸が高鳴るように。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Meditasyondan dinç ve alışılmadık derecede sakin bir şekilde uyanıyorsun. Sanki dondurucu bir şelalenin altında duş almış ya da binlerce kulunun karşısında konuşma yapmışsın da kalbin övgüden patlayacakmış gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You awaken from your meditation with a sense of vigour and unusual calm. As if you have just taken a shower under a freezing waterfall. Or delivered a speech in front of thousands of subjects and your heart swells from the crowd's adulation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Meditasyondan dinç ve alışılmadık derecede sakin bir şekilde uyanıyorsun. Sanki dondurucu bir şelalenin altında duş almış ya da binlerce kulunun karşısında bir konuşma yapmışsın da kalbin övgülerden patlayacakmış gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
